result.eng: Will you have another drink?
result.ga: an mbeidh deoch eile agat
result.orig: an mbeidh deoch eile agat
result.html: an mbeidh deoch eile agatWill you have another drink?
result.ponchtml: an mbeiḋ deoċ eile agatWill you have another drink?

result.eng: Would you like another drink?
result.ga: ar mhaith leat deoch eile
result.orig: ar mhaith leat deoch eile
result.html: ar mhaith leat deoch eileWould you like another drink?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat deoċ eileWould you like another drink?

result.eng: Would you like a drink? - Okay.
result.ga: ar mhaith leat deoch - ceart go leor
result.orig: ar mhaith leat deoch - ceart go leor
result.html: ar mhaith leat deoch - ceart go leorWould you like a drink? - Okay.
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat deoċ - ceart go leorWould you like a drink? - Okay.

result.eng: We'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ga: beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.orig: beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.html: beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimheWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ deoċ againn i dteaċ táḃairne in aice láiṁeWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.

result.eng: Drink and sandwiches will be available.
result.ga: beidh deoch agus ceapairí ar fáil
result.orig: beidh deoch agus ceapairí ar fáil
result.html: beidh deoch agus ceapairí ar fáilDrink and sandwiches will be available.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ deoċ agus ceapairí ar fáilDrink and sandwiches will be available.

result.eng: I needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ga: bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.orig: bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.html: bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: ḃí deoċ uaim aċ ḃí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.

result.eng: She gave them food an drink.
result.ga: thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.orig: thug sí bia agus deoch dóibh
result.html: thug sí bia agus deoch dóibhShe gave them food an drink.
result.ponchtml: ṫug sí bia agus deoċ dóiḃShe gave them food an drink.

result.eng: You spend too much money on drink.
result.ga: caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.orig: caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoch
result.html: caitheann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deochYou spend too much money on drink.
result.ponchtml: caiṫeann tú an iomarca airgid ar an deoċYou spend too much money on drink.

result.eng: We have to drink to your health.
result.ga: caithfidh muid do shláinte a ól
result.orig: caithfidh muid do shláinte a ól
result.html: caithfidh muid do shláinte a ólWe have to drink to your health.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ muid do ẛláinte a ólWe have to drink to your health.

result.eng: He raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ga: d'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.orig: d'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ól
result.html: d'ardaigh sé a ghloine chun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.
result.ponchtml: d'ardaiġ sé a ġloine ċun sláinte a ólHe raised his glass to drink to health.

result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: d'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: d'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.html: d'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan sé ón ól b'in é an príoṁrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.

result.eng: I'd say I had more to drink that he.
result.ga: déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean
result.orig: déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigesean
result.html: déarfainn go raibh níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a bhí aigeseanI'd say I had more to drink that he.
result.ponchtml: déarfainn go raiḃ níos mó ólta agamsa ná mar a ḃí aigeseanI'd say I had more to drink that he.

result.eng: This drink is free.
result.ga: tá an deoch seo saor in aisce
result.orig: tá an deoch seo saor in aisce
result.html: tá an deoch seo saor in aisceThis drink is free.
result.ponchtml: tá an deoċ seo saor in aisceThis drink is free.

result.eng: I have a drink already.
result.ga: tá deoch agam cheana
result.orig: tá deoch agam cheana
result.html: tá deoch agam cheanaI have a drink already.
result.ponchtml: tá deoċ agam ċeanaI have a drink already.

result.eng: And yourself, what will you drink?
result.ga: agus tú féin céard a ólfaidh tusa
result.orig: agus tú féin céard a ólfaidh tusa
result.html: agus tú féin céard a ólfaidh tusaAnd yourself, what will you drink?
result.ponchtml: agus tú féin céard a ólfaiḋ tusaAnd yourself, what will you drink?

result.eng: I will drink a bottle of beer, please.
result.ga: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoil
result.orig: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoil
result.html: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoilI will drink a bottle of beer, please.
result.ponchtml: Ólfaiḋ mé buidéal beoraċ le do ṫoilI will drink a bottle of beer, please.

result.eng: Do you drink wine?
result.ga: an ólann tú fíon
result.orig: an ólann tú fíon
result.html: an ólann tú fíonDo you drink wine?
result.ponchtml: an ólann tú fíonDo you drink wine?

result.eng: I drink only stout.
result.ga: ní ólaim ach pórtar
result.orig: ní ólaim ach pórtar
result.html: ní ólaim ach pórtarI drink only stout.
result.ponchtml: ní ólaim aċ pórtarI drink only stout.

result.eng: I drink neither wine nor whiskey.
result.ga: ní ólaim fíon ná fuisce
result.orig: ní ólaim fíon ná fuisce
result.html: ní ólaim fíon ná fuisceI drink neither wine nor whiskey.
result.ponchtml: ní ólaim fíon ná fuisceI drink neither wine nor whiskey.

result.eng: Do you want something to drink?
result.ga: an bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ól
result.orig: an bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ól
result.html: an bhfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ólDo you want something to drink?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil rud eicínt uait le n-ólDo you want something to drink?

result.eng: Not that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ga: chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.orig: chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól ach
result.html: chan díth nár mhaith liom bhur sláinte a ól achNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...
result.ponchtml: ċan díṫ nár ṁaiṫ liom ḃur sláinte a ól aċNot that I wouldn't like to drink to your health but...

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: The man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ga: tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.orig: tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anocht
result.html: tá braon ar bord ag an fhear anochtThe man has a drink taken tonight.
result.ponchtml: tá braon ar bord ag an ḟear anoċtThe man has a drink taken tonight.
